item.title: Fall 2020 Schedule
item.description: 2020-08-31: Meeting 1 Location: Zoom Time: 5:45pm Mountain Subject: Intro to the Club What is the Cybersecurity Club? What do we do every week? What can you expect this semester, given how crazy the world is? Depending on attendee experience: Install and explain a Kali Linux VM OR HtB Slides Meeting Recording 2020-09-07: NO MEETING: Labor Day 2020-09-14: Meeting 2 Location: Zoom Time: 5:30pm Mountain Due to inexperience with Zoom’s breakout rooms, a recording for this meeting is not available.
